DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy adult male female , age 2050 year BMI 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 per WHO Classification ( 1998 ) Exclusion criterion : Hyperlipidemia ( TC > 6.2 mmol/L , TAG > 2.0 mmol/L ) History chronic disease type 2 DM , heart disease , cancer Habitual smoker ( > 2 stick day ) Hypertensives : > 140/90 mmHg On medication/nutraceuticals reduce blood lipid , blood pressure Pregnant lactate woman Planned trip abroad/overseas period study
